forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before midnight. Mostly cloudy. Low around 69, with temperatures rising to around 72 overnight. Southwest wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 86. West wind 3 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 63, with temperatures rising to around 65 overnight. West northwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 88. West wind 2 to 6 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
